item.title: Head Tracking and Gaze Detection
item.description:
Kinect 3D camera is used to track human gaze detection.

Done while working at LSI.

item.title: Head Registration
item.description:
Marks on heads - 3D feature points. Black marks - feature points without correspondence. Blue marks (and dotted lines between them) - feature points with established correspondence.

Frameskip - 5 frames.

Done while working at LSI.

item.title: 2D Head Pose Estimation
item.description:
Due to the simple nature of the algorithm, head pose estimation works adequately only in XY plane.

Left pic - original film, right pic - human body only extracted from the previous one.

Red rectangle - head area, blue ellipse - head approximation, green line - head main direction in XY plane.

Done while working at LSI.
